html:
Initial Planning & Design

  • Define product scope, features, and target market requirements.
  • Complete detailed technical specifications and architectural design.
  • Secure all necessary resources and allocate project budget.

Core Development & Alpha Build

  • Develop core product functionalities and backend infrastructure.
  • Conduct internal alpha testing to identify major bugs and issues.
  • Integrate key third-party components and APIs successfully.

Beta Program & User Feedback

  • Launch comprehensive external beta program with selected users.
  • Collect and analyze user feedback for product improvements.
  • Implement critical bug fixes and performance optimizations.

Final Preparations & Launch

  • Complete all marketing materials, press releases, and launch strategy.
  • Finalize legal reviews, compliance checks, and operational readiness.
  • Execute product launch, monitor initial performance and user adoption.
